source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Learn how to Price your Embroidery or Dressmaking crafts

visible_instructors.title: Philip Viljoen
visible_instructors.job_title: Building Contractor, Author, Coach & Software Instructor
visible_instructors.name: Philip

visible_instructors.title: Jacqui Viljoen
visible_instructors.job_title: Teaching Bernina Embroidery Software @ School of Digitizing
visible_instructors.name: Jacqui

items.headline: Learn how to set up your Craft Business from Home. Charge for any service. We have Included Our Windows Software.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to calculate your most profitable Charge Out Rate and never work without making profit.
You will know how to install the Price For Profit Software and WP Plugin and how to use it to manage your business.

items.title: Watercolor Painting for Beginners by Award Winning Artist
items.headline: Learn insider secrets tips and tricks | Watercolor made easy | Success with Popular Projects from my watercolor workshop
objectives_summary: Students will grow in artistic confidence by creating a beautiful watercolor koi fish painting in this step by step tutorial.
You will learn amazing tips and techniques that I have made easy for all students to paint their masterpiece no matter what your skill level.
Understand how adding bleed proof ink can enhance your watercolor painting.

items.title: How to Draw a Dog
items.headline: Learn how to draw a realistic dog portrait with charcoal and chalk on toned paper
objectives_summary: How to draw a beautiful and realistic dog portrait, with charcoal and chalk on toned paper.
The correct and essential anatomy of dog's skull.
The correct and essential anatomy of dog's head muscles.

items.title: Indian Kids Wear Basic Stitching Course

visible_instructors.title: Praseela N
visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur, Diploma holder in soaps and cosmetics
visible_instructors.name: Praseela

items.headline: Learn stitching from the comfort of your home and stitch dresses for your loved ones.
objectives_summary: You are going to learn basic kids wear stitching Indian Style

items.title: Sewing Basics For Apparel Making
items.headline: Learn how to professionally finish garments
objectives_summary: Learn a variety of seam finishes and sewing techniques used in apparel making
Learn how to wind a bobbin and thread your sewing machine
Create a sample book of all your new skills

items.title: How To Paint a Realistic Otter In Watercolour, Step by Step
items.headline: Let me guide you step by step on how to paint this cute and amazing Otter in watercolor! Let's get those brushes wet!
objectives_summary: Learn to paint this Otter while you are guided step by step through a range of watercolour techniques.
This video takes you through the whole process of painting this cute Otter in fine detailed watercolour.
Techniques such as wet in wet and how to paint wet fur!

items.title: Learn how to paint my Watercolor painting wedding portrait.

visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.name: David

items.headline: Follow my step by step lessons,right from the beginning,paint watercolor portraits like a professional artist does it!
objectives_summary: To draw and paint a spectacular portrait from photographs
how to use just one color to paint a portrait
how to use tracedown paper to make a professional pencil drawing

items.title: Fishing with Grandpa
items.headline: If you are an Artist at heart and love to paint from photograph references in watercolours, this course is for you!
objectives_summary: Students will be shown step by step how to approach a photograph of a Grandpa and his Grandson fishing and create a watercolour painting.
Students will be shown how to transfer any image on a photograph onto their watercolour paper.
Many watercolour common and unusual techniques will be demonstrated.

items.title: DIY - Learn to Repair your Clothes with a Sewing Machine

visible_instructors.title: Léonie Daignault-Leclerc
visible_instructors.job_title: Designer et fondatrice de Gaia & Dubos
visible_instructors.name: Léonie

items.headline: Learn the basics of clothes mending and don't ever pay a seamstress again!
objectives_summary: You will learn to mend your clothes yourself! You won't have to pay a seamstress ever again, plus, your clothes will last longer!

items.title: Watercolor with Me: Cheery Cherry Blossom Tree
items.headline: Relax and paint a cheerful cherry tree in a loose impressionism style with watercolor and gouache.
objectives_summary: Real-time painting of a loose, impressionistic, cheerful cherry blossom tree with watercolor and gouache!
Basic watercolor techniques such as wet on wet, and wet on dry.
To focus on art for relaxation and enjoyment.

items.title: Kintsugi Course2　How to fix a crack
items.headline: Course2　ヒビを直す（銀仕上げ／消し仕上げ法）
objectives_summary: Experience traditional Kintsugi work　伝統的な金継ぎの作業を体験できる
Those who Get an opportunity to experience Japanese culture　日本文化に触れる機会が得られるcan understand and respond to the characteristics of Urushi　漆の特性を理解し対応できる方
Learn safe repair of broken or chipped vessels　壊れたり欠けたりした器の安全な修復が学べる

items.title: How To Paint in Watercolor a Realistic Bird | Goldfinch
items.headline: Learn detailed, layered looking paint feathers, realistic eyes, use watercolour white, paint textured wood + much more!
objectives_summary: Learn to paint this beautiful colourful Goldfinch bird while I guide you step by step through a range of watercolour techniques.
We will be using various techniques throught the process, so get ready to sit, relax and have fun!
How to paint layrers of feathers using watercolour

items.title: Birch bark Lighthouse pendants | Jewelry Necklaces | Resin
items.headline: Create the perfect gift - A Fun easy project that creates such a cheerful & fashionable piece of natural wearable art.
objectives_summary: You will be able to achieve some simple yet elegant pieces of jewelry to wear or gift.
Learn to paint  details on a Birch bark using an engraving tool and pen and ink.
This is a basic short and simple course filled with short sections on creating these Birch Bark jewelry pieces.

items.title: FLOWER MAKING COURSE
items.headline: FLOWER MAKING COURSE (Soft pastels)
objectives_summary: Paper Flowers
How to handcut without any dies
How to color with soft pastels

items.title: Learn how to paint 3 FREE style watercolors for beginners.

visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.name: David

items.headline: 3 complete watercolor sessions on how to paint freely,following my live Facebook broadcasts paint 3 beginners paintings.
objectives_summary: You will be able to use the Hake brush with more confidence
You will be able to use my limited 7 color pallette in many ways
You will see how using a hairdryer can help create textures and speed thing up

items.title: How to Make 4 Types of Sugar Succulent

visible_instructors.title: Imogen Davison
visible_instructors.job_title: Cake Decorating Tutor at Sugar Buttons Cakes
visible_instructors.name: Imogen

items.headline: Create succulents for cakes from sugarpaste using homemade moulds, cutters and hand modelling.
objectives_summary: How to make 4 types of Sugar Succulent
